title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available in Navigator
description: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available in Navigator (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 projects are selected in the Navigator, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available when multiple projects are selected in the Navigator.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 2. Select P2 in the Navigator. 3. Attempt to close the selected project.
